basic_info.description2: I'm interested in app development and IoT. For the whole Backend part, I mainly use JavaScript. I'm looking to expand my knowledge in the Back-end area with C# and gain experience in Front-end area with Angular and React.

section_name.contact: Since you've come this far, let's talk?

experience.company: IFSC - Instituto Federal de Santa Catarina
experience.title: Electronics voctional course

projects.title: Creepy Caves Game
projects.description: Game developed entirely in C language using the Allegro 5 library during programming classes at IFSC, this being the final project of the subject.

projects.title: DMDC Stagging Server
projects.description: Server developed for an IoT voltage and current meter based on an ESP32 module during the mandatory IFSC internship with Professor Clovis Petry. STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT!

projects.title: DMDC Mobile App
projects.description: App developed to visualize data from a server for an IoT voltage and current meter based on an ESP32 module during the mandatory IFSC internship with Professor Clovis Petry.

projects.title: DMDC Client Firmware
projects.description: Code developed to measure voltage and current and send its data via http GET using an ESP32 module as a base during the mandatory IFSC internship with Professor Clovis Petry.

projects.title: SCO MQTT Client Firmware
projects.description: Code developed to measure humidity and temperature and publish to a server using the MQTT protocol.

projects.title: SCO MQTT Dashboard
projects.description: Code developed to present data from a humidity and temperature sensor using the MQTT protocol.
